fields.name: Creative Commons 3.0: Attribution Non-commercial No Derivatives
fields.summary: Must be redistributed unchanged and in whole, with credit to the author.

fields.name: Creative Commons 3.0: Attribution Non-commercial Share Alike
fields.summary: Remixes, derivatives, translations and tweaks are okay.  You must attribute the author.  Derivative works must carry this same license.

fields.name: Creative Commons 3.0: Attribution Non-commercial
fields.summary: Remixes, derivatives, translations and tweaks are okay.  You must attribute the author.  Derivative works may choose their own terms, but must remain non-commercial.

fields.name: Creative Commons 3.0: Attribution No Derivatives
fields.summary: Must be used for commercial purposes, redistributed unchanged and in whole, with credit to the author.

fields.name: Creative Commons 3.0: Attribution Share Alike
fields.summary: Remixes, derivatives, translations and tweaks are okay, and may be used for commercial purposes  You must attribute the author.  Derivative works must carry this same license.  Much like open source software licenses.

fields.name: Creative Commons 3.0: Attribution
fields.summary: Anything goes, so long as you attribute the original author.
